Package com.dromedarydrones.mainapp

Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
com.dromedarydrones.mainapp.Simulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
XmlSerializable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<SimulationResults>
public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
implements XmlSerializable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<SimulationResults>
A standalone configuration of a simulation containing meals, food items, delivery points, and drone settings.
